Package model

Class ViewerSubject

java.lang.Object
model.ViewerSubject
Direct Known Subclasses:
AnalysisSubject
public abstract class ViewerSubject
extends java.lang.Object
This class is an abstract subject which can be observed by a dynamic number of viewers.

Viewers can be attached to or detached from the subject such that the subject can notify all attached viewers of any changes to the subject's state.

Author:
Matthew Da Silva

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    ViewerSubject()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void attach​(Viewer observer)
    This method attaches a Viewer type object to the subject.
    void detach​(Viewer observer)
    This method detaches a Viewer type object from the subject (if it is attached).
    void notify_viewers()
    This method notifies all attached Viewer objects that the subject has changed (attached Viewers are updated).

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • ViewerSubject

      public ViewerSubject()

  • Method Details

    • attach

      public void attach​(Viewer observer)
      This method attaches a Viewer type object to the subject.
      Parameters:
      observer - A Viewer which wants to be notified to changes in the subject

    • detach

      public void detach​(Viewer observer)
      This method detaches a Viewer type object from the subject (if it is attached).
      Parameters:
      observer - A Viewer which no longer wants to be notified to changes in the subject

    • notify_viewers

      public void notify_viewers()
      This method notifies all attached Viewer objects that the subject has changed (attached Viewers are updated).
